thread.title: Anne Curtis & Erwan Heussaff’s Wedding Is Going to Come Sooner than You Thought
thread.title_full: Anne Curtis & Erwan Heussaff’s Wedding Is Going to Come Sooner than You Thought

title: Anne Curtis & Erwan Heussaff’s Wedding Is Going to Come Sooner than You Thought
text:
By Olivia Estrada 

Better ready your heart and your social media feed as Anne Curtis reveals that she and Erwan Heussaff are already planning their wedding. They want to have the big day this year, because who has time for long engagements anyway? 
Between Erwan’s Tastemade videos and Anne’s TV commitments, it’s amazing how these two managed to find time for their wedding plans. “Actually, we’re gonna start planning this coming Easter holidays,” Anne tells Bandera at a recent press conference 
“So, that’s the time na we will start planning. Basta it will happen this year,” says the actress without giving too much away. 
As for entourage, she confirmed that some of them will be from her Showtime family. “ Hindi naman siguro lahat will be part of the entourage , pero meron po (Not all of them will be part of the entourage but there will be a few [from Showtime ],” Anne shares. Ouch. Wonder who won’t make the cut?
